role.argrole: in what? (marked by من / في / ب)

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS صرح) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مؤتمر) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN صحافي))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS ه)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM واثق) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اعادة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN انتخاب) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN رئاسة) (NP (PUNC ") (DET+NOUN_PROP الفيفا) (PUNC ")))))))))

arg.g: of his re-election to the presidency of FIFA
